**Wayde Gilliam (ohmeow)**  
I'm a full stack web application and AI/ML developer with well over 20 years in the business. 

In addition to being the author of [blurr](https://ohmeow.github.io/blurr/){target="_blank"}, a python library that enables fast.ai developers to train Hugging Face transformers for core NLP tasks, I'm also a proud [fast.ai community leader](https://forums.fast.ai/u/wgpubs/summary){target="_blank"}, where I'm active in both contributing to their deep learning library and helping folks out on the forums and discord.
